mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, user_id, memberAddress, memberContact, nickname) values (member_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberContact}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: select member_id, member_address, member_contact, nickname from member where member_id > 0
select member_id, member_address, member_contact, nickname from member where member_id=#{memberId}
